items.episodeTitle: The latest ITV News headlines - as the World Cup final gets underway
items.synopsis: Your 90-second summary of today's top stories from the ITV News team.

items.episodeTitle: World Cup final latest score: Argentina 2 - France 2
items.synopsis: France are playing Argentina in the 2022 World Cup final.

items.episodeTitle: 'Delighted' FA confirm Gareth Southgate will lead England until at least 2024
items.synopsis: Gareth Southgate will stay on as England men's manager, following their quarter-final exit from the Qatar World Cup.

items.episodeTitle: Teenager charged with people-smuggling offence after four died while crossing Channel
items.synopsis: 19-year-old Ibrahima Bah has been charged with facilitating attempted illegal entry into the UK.

items.episodeTitle: Army on standby to cover striking ambulance workers despite concerns over lack of training
items.synopsis: Ministers are preparing to draft in more than 1200 Army, Navy and RAF personnel to help fill the gap when workers go on strike.

items.episodeTitle: Winter strikes calendar: Is there an end in sight?
items.synopsis: This December comes with a lot of promised strike action across multiple sectors - from the railways to the NHS. So what dates will see more than one strike?

items.episodeTitle: Tributes paid to 'adorable' mother who died in concert crush
items.synopsis: 33-year-old Rebecca Ikumelo was one of three people critically injured outside the Brixton Academy in London.

items.episodeTitle: Is this the end of the cold weather?
items.synopsis: Temperatures will soar to as high as 14C in parts of the UK on Monday thanks to milder air coming in from the Atlantic.

items.episodeTitle: Winter as a weapon: Ukraine faces bombardment amid freezing temperatures
items.synopsis: Residents have been struggling to stay warm as a Russian offensive targets critical energy infrastructure in Ukraine.

items.episodeTitle: Cost of Christmas dinner: Families face an extra £30 for turkey and trimmings
items.synopsis: Households will have to fork out even more for Christmas dinner this year, due to rising prices. The steepest rise in costs is for parsnips and potatoes.

items.episodeTitle: The Rundown: ITV News' daily update for teenagers
items.synopsis: Watch a new edition of The Rundown every afternoon.

items.episodeTitle: Dramatic changes in conditions: The latest ITV Weather forecast
items.synopsis: Watch the latest UK forecast from the ITV Weather team.

items.episodeTitle: Watch the latest ITV News headlines
items.synopsis: Catch up with the most recent edition of ITV News.
